Uses of Class
org.transitime.utils.Time

  • Packages that use Time 
    Package Description
    org.transitime.api.data
    This package contains the classes for the objects that are serialized into JSON or XML.
    org.transitime.applications
    Contains the top level static main() methods for the applications that constitute the Transitime system.
    org.transitime.db.structs
    Contains the descriptions of the classes for the objects that are read and written to the database.
    org.transitime.statistics
    Contains statistics classes such as for generating more accurate schedule times by using GPS information on when the vehicles really do depart.

    • Uses of Time in org.transitime.api.data

      Constructors in org.transitime.api.data with parameters of type Time 
      Constructor and Description
      ApiVehicleDetails(IpcVehicle vehicle, Time timeForAgency, TransitimeApi.UiMode... uiType)
      Takes a Vehicle object for client/server communication and constructs a ApiVehicle object for the API.

    • Uses of Time in org.transitime.applications

      Methods in org.transitime.applications that return Time 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Time Core.getTime()
      For when want to use methods in Time.

    • Uses of Time in org.transitime.db.structs

      Methods in org.transitime.db.structs that return Time 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Time Agency.getTime()
      Returns cached Time object which allows one to easly convert epoch time to time of day and such.

    • Uses of Time in org.transitime.statistics

      Constructors in org.transitime.statistics with parameters of type Time 
      Constructor and Description
